    public static final class DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder
extends Object
    A builder for DB2ConnectionConfiguration.

        public DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder securityMechanism(int secmec)
        Sets the security mechanism to use. Defaults to USERID_PASSWORD.
        Parameters:

        this DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder

      • enableSSL

        public DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder enableSSL(boolean value)
        Enable or disable SSL support. Currently SSL is supported for Server Authentication mode only. Client Authentication and Mutual Authentication modes are not supported currently.
        Parameters:
        value - true enables SSL support and false disables SSL support.
        Returns:
        this DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder

      • trustStorePath

        public DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder trustStorePath(String path)
        When SSL is enabled, sets the path to the SSL Trust Store file. The trust store is expected to be in JKS format with Server Certificate imported in it. Currently SSL is supported for Server Authentication mode only.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to SSL Trust Store file.
        Returns:
        this DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder

      • trustStorePassword

        public DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder trustStorePassword(String password)
        When SSL is enabled, sets the password to use with the SSL Trust Store file.
        Parameters:
        password - the password to use with the SSL Trust Store.
        Returns:
        this DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder

      • fetchSize

        public DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder fetchSize(int n)
        Sets the number of rows to be fetched in one go from the server. Default value is 100.
        Parameters:
        n - fetch size
        Returns:
        this DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder

      • conPoolSize

        public DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder conPoolSize(int n)
        Sets the connection pool size. Default value is 10.
        Parameters:
        n - number of connections to be pooled.
        Returns:
        this DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder

      • stmtCacheSize

        public DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder stmtCacheSize(int n)
        Sets the number of DB2PreparedStatements to be cached. Default value is 30.
        Parameters:
        n - number of statements to be cached.
        Returns:
        this DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder

      • isolation

        public DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder isolation(io.r2dbc.spi.IsolationLevel level)
        Sets the transaction isolation level. Default value is read committed.
        Parameters:
        level - isolation level.
        Returns:
        this DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder.

      • keepDynamic

        public DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder keepDynamic(boolean value)
        Sets the keep dynamic option. If the keep dynamic bind option used for binding the DB2 Connect packages is YES, then set this option to true. The default value for this option is false.
        Parameters:
        value - either true or false
        Returns:
        this DB2ConnectionConfiguration.Builder.
